required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety of an Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine (CoronaVac) in Children and Adolescents
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blinded, Placebo-Controlled, Phase Ⅱb Clinical Trial, to Evaluate the Safety of the Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine (Vero Cell) in Healthy Population Aged From 3 to 17 Years.

lead_sponsor.agency: Sinovac Research and Development Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blinded, placebo-controlled, phase Ⅱb clinical trial of an inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine (CoronaVac) manufactured by Sinovac Research and Development Co., Ltd..The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of the SARS-CoV-2 Inactivated vaccine in healthy children and adolescents aged 3-17 years.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blinded, placebo-controlled,phase Ⅱb clinical trial in children and adolescents aged 3-17 years. The experimental vaccine and placebo were both manufactured by Sinovac Research and Development Co., Ltd.. A total of 500 subjects will be enrolled, including 100 children aged 3-5 years, 200 children aged 6-11 years and 200 adolescents aged 12-17 years. Each age group will be randomly divided into two groups in a 3:1 ratio and received two doses of experimental vaccine or placebo on on day 0 and day 28.

primary_outcome.description: Incidence rate of adverse reactions occured from the beginning of the vaccination to 28 days after the second dose.

secondary_outcome.description: Incidence rate of adverse reactions within 7 days after each dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety index-incidence of serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the beginning of the vaccination to 6 months after the second dose vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence rate of serious adverse events from the beginning of the vaccination to 6 months after the second dose vaccination.

arm_group.description: Participant will receive two doses of medium dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine . Vaccine will given by intramuscular injection on day 0 and day 28.
Placebo will receive two doses of placebo. The placebo will given by intramuscular injection on day 0 and day 28.

intervention.description: 600SU inactivated virus in 0·5 mL of aluminium hydroxide solution per injection

overall_official.affiliation: Hubei Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

facility.name: Zanhuang county Center for Disease Control and Prevention
